Total Cost of Revenue: cost of goods and services sold
cost of goods sold excluding depreciation depletion and amortization
cost of sales excluding depreciation depletion and amortization
results of operations expense from oil and gas producing activities

Income Before Taxes: pretax asset impairment and related items
Net Income: income loss from continuing operations including portion attributable to noncontrolling interest
net income loss attributable to common stockholders

Other Income (Expense): equity method investment realized gain loss on disposal
gain loss on disposition of assets including oil and gas properties
gain loss on disposition of assets1
gain loss on sale of oil and gas property
gain on sale of assets and equity investments
gain on sale of equity investments and other assets
gains on sale of equity investments and other assets
gainson saleof equity investmentsand other assets
income loss from equity method investments

General and Administrative: results of operations general and administrative related to oil and gas producing activities
Other Operating Expenses: taxes excluding income and excise taxes

Basic EPS: income loss from continuing operations per basic share
Diluted EPS: income loss from continuing operations per diluted share

__unmapped__: common stock dividends per share declared
discontinued operation income loss from discontinued operation net of tax per basic share
discontinued operation income loss from discontinued operation net of tax per diluted share
general and administrative expense and other operating expenses
income loss from discontinued operations net of tax
income loss from discontinued operations net of tax attributable to reporting entity
income loss from discontinued operations net of tax per basic share

preferred stock dividends and other adjustments
gain loss on derivative instruments net pretax
income loss from continuing operations before income taxes extraordinary items noncontrolling interest
